Description:
Notice Serial Number:  PH/301121/1   312201182
As an employer you have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely metal working fluid, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.At the time of inspection the XYZ CNC lathe PT81 (serial no. L863) was not fitted with a device to remove mist produced from metal working fluids.

Notice Serial Number:  PH/301121/2   312201263
As an employer you have failed to ensure that exposure of your emplyees to substances hazardous to health, namely metal working fluid, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled. At the time of inspection the XYZ 1100HD CNC milling machine PT84 (serial no. SMP10129) was not fitted with a device to remove mist produced from metal working fluids.

Notice Serial Number:  PH/301121/3   312201305
You have failed to ensure that any employee who is, or is liable to be, exposed to a substance hazardous to health, such as metal working fluid (MWF) which is a known skin sensitiser and asthmagen, is under suitable health surveillance.
